basics.name: Janet Jeffus
basics.label: Senior Web & Mobile Developer | 15+ Years | Legacy Systems, APIs, Flutter, Rails, React
basics.summary: I’m a senior web and mobile developer with 15+ years of experience building, fixing, and modernizing production systems.  I specialize in taking over complex or neglected codebases and making them stable, secure, and scalable.  Fluent in English (native), intermediate in Thai ฉันสามารถพูด ฟัง อ่าน เขียนภาษาไทยได้ค่ะ On track to achieve HSK3 in Mandarin Chinese this year

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead the project for updating a line of educational books, videos and meta data collection for an extensive modernization project. Created 7,256 figures, categorized, identified and extracted from a book series. Hired contractors, conducting interviews and hiring talent. Lead the project creating custom software in Node/Electron for categorization and annotation from start to finish. Spearheaded the creation of a video conversion and categorization system in Ruby utilizing AI and contract workers to identify and provide annotations for over 700 videos.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Drove product development, authentication and geospatial (GIS) integration for a commercial real estate appraisal platform. Cultivated high-performing teams by implementing pair programming, robust testing, and a product-focused workflow, strengthening both technical output and collaborative relationships.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Added 23 languages to the platform with tooling and translation back-end. Developed a custom solution that rewrote over 30% of the code base and instantly added i18n tokens in all templates and JavaScript.

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
experience.description: Senior full-stack Ruby on Rails developer working on re-designing and revamping major portions of the software platform.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: Helpkin is the new app for parents to share childcare with people they can trust, like date night swaps and last-minute help, for free. Leading the tech team to a beautiful product launch.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: Bringing innovation to the fashion industry building a trail blazing social platform for fashion discovery. Share style inspiration with brands and fashion lovers around the world. Shop the looks you love with just one tap.

experience.title: Senior Ruby Developer
experience.description: Lead the integration and development of a big data scale business directory. As well as acquired large-scale marketing lead data from a diverse and cross platform array of sources that lead to a significant increase in leads acquired.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: Chief Technology Officer and System Architect of a complex suite of products that automated business listings on local search directories. Lead a team of up to 15 developers in building from the ground up a multi-platform product base. This led to over 180,000 lines of code being written in five languages for three operating systems in 18 repositories. The technology grew the customer base by over 200%.

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: First to market and market leader of online local Bitcoin trading that sounded a clarion call for a local-gap trading solution within the Bitcoin economy.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: Team leader and system architect for a big data real estate listing aggregator. Combined all localized real estate listings in a user friendly interface.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: Co-founder, architect and senior developer for an online learning platform that was a first to market courseware and curriculum marketplace named Scholar Square.

recommendations.author: Phil Knowles
recommendations.relationship: Phil worked with Janet on the same team
recommendations.text:
Janet's advanced skillset, coupled with her extensive experience,
make her an outstanding team player and a tremendous asset to
any organization. I absolutely endorse Janet Jeffus as a Senior
Software Engineer and am confident that she will continue to excel
in any role she undertakes.

recommendations.author: Josh Willis
recommendations.text:
Janet knows more about programming then most software
companies combined. She is excellent to work with, and I learned
more in the 9 months I worked for her than the rest of my career
combined. She would be an outstanding addition to, or leader of,
any project.

recommendations.author: Mark Davis
recommendations.text:
Janet is an outstanding senior engineer and consummate
professional. She joined our team as a Senior Software Engineer.
Thanks to her exceptional performance as a designer, developer,
and mentor, she rose quickly to a technical leadership role in the
company. I've never met anyone as broadly talented in software
technology. But the icing on the cake is her ability to work with
others. She's a naturally empathetic person, able to encourage and
challenge those around her to learn and grow professionally and
personally. She is an asset to any organization, and given the
chance I'd hire her in a second.

recommendations.author: Steven Hirlston
recommendations.author_title: Senior Software Engineer | Ruby on Rails
recommendations.relationship: Steven worked with Janet on the same team
recommendations.text:
Janet is deeply experienced and knowledgeable about all aspects
of software engineering and design. She is also incredibly helpful
and eager to teach what she knows to others.

recommendations.author: Jacques Fournier
recommendations.author_title: Web App Developer & Real Estate Appraiser
recommendations.relationship: Jacques worked with Janet on the same team
recommendations.text:
I had the great privilege of working with Ms. Jeffus at RealQuantum
from 2022-2023. She was the most experienced engineer on our
team and as a result, was responsible for some of the most
important and complex assignments, such as implementation of
single sign-on (SSO) using Auth0 and Azure. She was also
extremely enthusiastic about helping others with any problem,
doing flawless deployments, and leading our team meetings. She
would be a great asset to any team, including as lead developer or
CTO, and I hope that I have the opportunity to work with her again
in the future.

recommendations.author: Malachai Frazier
recommendations.relationship: Malachai worked with Janet on the same team
recommendations.text:
It has been a true privilege to work alongside Janet Jeffus at
RealQuantum. As a Senior Software Engineer, her skill level is truly
top-notch, and her ability to tackle even the most complex
challenges is nothing short of impressive. Janet's expertise and
deep understanding of software engineering have made her an
indispensable asset to our team.
